content: National women's ice hockey teamThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Singapore women's national ice hockey team" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Singapore women's national ice hockey team** is the women's national [ice hockey](/wiki/Ice_hockey) team in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## History In the [2019 IIHF Women's Challenge Cup of Asia](/wiki/2019_IIHF_Women%27s_Challenge_Cup_of_Asia), the team finished third behind [Thailand](/wiki/Thailand_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team) and [Chinese Taipei](/wiki/Chinese_Taipei_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team). Wasunun Angkulpattanasuk of Thailand finished as the tournaments leading goaltender with a save percentage of 93.62 however the IIHF Directorate named Singapore's Qina Foo as the best goaltender. ## Tournament record ### World Championships - (/wiki/2024_IIHF_Women%27s_World_Championship_Division_III) – 44th place (4th in IIIB) - (/wiki/2025_IIHF_Women%27s_World_Championship_Division_III) – 45th place (5th in IIIB) ### Other competitions - [2014 IIHF Women's Challenge Cup of Asia Division I](/wiki/2014_IIHF_Women%27s_Challenge_Cup_of_Asia_Division_I) – 3rd place(7th overall) - [2016 IIHF Women's Challenge Cup of Asia Division I](/wiki/2016_IIHF_Women%27s_Challenge_Cup_of_Asia_Division_I) – 3rd place(3rd overall) - [2017 IIHF Women's Challenge Cup of Asia](/wiki/2017_IIHF_Women%27s_Challenge_Cup_of_Asia) – 3rd place - [2018 IIHF Women's Challenge Cup of Asia](/wiki/2018_IIHF_Women%27s_Challenge_Cup_of_Asia) – 4th place - [2019 IIHF Women's Challenge Cup of Asia](/wiki/2019_IIHF_Women%27s_Challenge_Cup_of_Asia) – 3rd place ## All-time record against other nations *Last match update: 18 March 2022* Key **Positive balance** (more Wins)**Neutral balance** (Wins = Losses)**Negative balance** (more Losses)TeamGPWTLGFGA [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team)3300134 [United Arab Emirates](/wiki/United_Arab_Emirates_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team)2200238 [India](/wiki/India_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team)2200172 [Philippines](/wiki/Philippines_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team)110062 [Hong Kong](/wiki/Hong_Kong_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team)100117 [Chinese Taipei](/wiki/Chinese_Taipei_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team)2002218 [Thailand](/wiki/Thailand_women%27s_national_ice_hockey_team)5005740Total168086981 - Official website - IIHF profile This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. title: Singapore women's national ice hockey team
